About the Company: Rajoo Engineers Ltd is engaged in the design and manufacture of an impressive range of blown film lines, sheet lines and thermo formers.The company`s product range includes Monolayer Blown Film Lines,Multilayer Blown Film Lines,Downward Extrusion Blown Film Lines,Foam Extrusion Lines,Mono & Multilayer Sheet Lines and Thermoforming Machine.
